data.eml:eml: On the identity of Lophostoma silvicolum occidentalis (Davis & Carter, 1978) (Chiroptera: Phyllostomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Velazco, Paúl M., Cadenillas, Richard (2011): On the identity of Lophostoma silvicolum occidentalis (Davis & Carter, 1978) (Chiroptera: Phyllostomidae). Zootaxa 2962: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207288
